channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Booking Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Booking Manager

item.title: CVE-2023-1977|2024-08-02T06:05:27.082Z -- unknown -- booking%20manager
item.description: The Booking Manager WordPress plugin before 2.0.29 does not validate URLs input in it's admin panel or in shortcodes for showing events from a remote .ics file, allowing an attacker with privileges as low as Subscriber to perform SSRF attacks on the sites internal network.
